text: All words are lures, all dreams, means. Some meanings lost, others mostly ((draws)) the slim files of random data fragged and tossed. The lessons scattered at bus stops. Forgotten angles on past lives. Situations not right. Solo entries onto barren planes, suggesting mighty stories savored late at night. Collapsing ((in)) piles on hotel room floors, circulating high above commercial districts. Emptying out into freeway sounds at night. Standing for thoughts never uttered, eyes shut tight against material operations going on as if on their own
